concept.title: Responding to an Application Support Event

keywords.indexterm: Responding to an application support eventShow newUpdated application support

conbody.p: Use the Show new or updated application support tool to see a count of the version mismatch messages, to view a list of application support version mismatches between the Marvel Enterprise Portal client and server, and to see instructions for correcting the discrepancy.
The number that is displayed after the tool, such as 8 for eight mismatch events, is a count of the events that have accumulated.
